      • increase

        void increase(ec.util.MersenneTwisterFast random,
              java.util.ArrayList<Location.Voxel> allVoxels,
              java.util.ArrayList<Location.Voxel> voxels,
              int target)
        Increases the number of voxels by adding from a given list of voxels.
        Parameters:
        random - the seeded random number generator
        allVoxels - the list of all possible voxels
        voxels - the list of selected voxels
        target - the target number of voxels

      • initialize

        public void initialize(Series series,
                       ec.util.MersenneTwisterFast random)
        Initializes the factory for the given series.

        For series with no loader, a list of available centers is created based on population settings. For series with a loader, the specified file is loaded into the factory.

        Parameters:
        series - the simulation series
        random - the random number generator

      • loadLocations

        void loadLocations(Series series)
        Loads location containers into the factory container.
        Parameters:
        series - the simulation series
